title: TSBitmap
authors: Li Wei, Nitin Kumar, Venkata Lolla, Eamonn Keogh, Stefano Lonardi, Chotirat Ann Ratanamahatana

parameters.name: feature_window_size
parameters.description: Size of the tumbling windows used for SAX discretization.

parameters.name: lead_window_size
parameters.description: How far to look ahead to create lead bitmap.

parameters.name: lag_window_size
parameters.description: How far to look back to create the lag bitmap.

parameters.name: alphabet_size
parameters.description: Number of bins for SAX discretization.

parameters.name: level_size
parameters.description: Desired level of recursion of the bitmap.

parameters.name: compression_ratio
parameters.description: How much to compress the timeseries in the PAA step. If `compression_ration == 1`, no compression.
